p: In the GENTA group, animals renal function parameters were significantly increased due to the gentamicine nephrotoxicity [ 71]. SCr, UCr, SU and UU were lowered by CHT pre-treatments in a concentration-dependent way, the higher concentration (CHT) having the better nephroprotection activity. CrCl did not change significantly due to the CHT pre-treatment ( p > 0.05).
